name: Coursera
description: Online learning platform partnering with universities to offer courses, certificates, and degrees

name: Udemy
description: Marketplace for online courses on any topic with instructor-created content

name: Khan Academy
description: Free online education platform with lessons in math, science, and humanities

name: Duolingo
description: Gamified language learning app with bite-sized lessons in 40+ languages

name: Chegg
description: Student learning platform with textbook rentals, homework help, and tutoring

name: Skillshare
description: Online learning community for creative skills like design, illustration, and photography

name: edX
description: Online learning platform with university-level courses from Harvard, MIT, and more

name: LinkedIn Learning
description: Professional development platform with courses in business, tech, and creative skills

name: Pluralsight
description: Technology skills platform for IT and software development training and assessment

name: Codecademy
description: Interactive coding education platform teaching programming through hands-on exercises

name: DataCamp
description: Online learning platform for data science, analytics, and AI skills

name: Brilliant
description: Interactive STEM learning platform with visual, problem-solving-based lessons

name: MasterClass
description: Online classes taught by world-famous experts and celebrities in various fields

name: Quizlet
description: Digital flashcard and study tool platform used by students worldwide

name: Notion
description: All-in-one workspace used by students for notes, wikis, and project organization

name: Grammarly
description: AI-powered writing assistant for grammar, spelling, tone, and clarity checking

name: Turnitin
description: Plagiarism detection and academic integrity platform used by educational institutions

name: Kahoot
description: Game-based learning platform for creating and playing educational quizzes

name: Canva for Education
description: Free design tool for schools and educators with templates for presentations and projects

name: Google Classroom
description: Free learning management system by Google for schools to distribute and grade assignments
